problem.p: Here's an example of a "Drag and Drop" question set. Click and drag each word in the scrollbar below, up to the numbered bucket which matches the number of letters in the word.

For this first problem, click on this link to see the code used to create it below. For each draggable id, which corresponds to the words in the horizontal table below the image, there is a specific correct location where the words can go. Specifying that is done by giving the coordinates in relation to the image you are using.
